title: I have delays, what can the reason be?
body:
Back then in season 6, some delays started bothering me, and it's not like the problem is with my ping or with my fps. my fps is about 200 and my ping is always around 80 - 90.
So now I back to the game and it's still the same, but it's just a key bored delay, the mouse the working properly, its just about the abilities.
And the problem is not with my key bored because it works well in other games. 
So what should I do? i talked to riot and they don't give a shit

replies.body:
Whenever your abilities are delayed, but your ping and FPS are still good, there's a good chance it's caused by packet loss. If your network connection is unstable, it may cause some of the data to be lost between your network and our servers. 

If you could take your latest game logs and use our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743), that should be able to tell us for sure if it's packet loss.
